attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as part of the classic car movement & recycler of cars,there are so many restriction put on us the main one being the ban on use of cellulose paint on motor vehicles,we are trying to restore/recycle older vehicles & what harm we are doing to our environment is almost nil agains't all these car factories manufacturing these euro-boxes,so i think a fair deal for classic car owners including re-instating the historic road tax year back to rolling every year introduced by the conservative party

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Please remove any references to political parties.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
